content.content0: The Computer Science Department at CMU offers a rigorous and practical undergraduate program focused on real-world problem solving.
content.content1: Join us to advance computer knowledge and innovation through our Master's program in computer science. Gain the skills to tackle complex tech challenges and collaborate on diverse projects with experts.
content.content2: Computer science research is the focus. Graduates of CMU who earned doctoral degrees make contributions to the field through creative research. Their writing should be published internationally.

lifelong.title1: By the Department of Computer Science and Department of Mathematics Faculty of Science Chiang Mai University Under the support of the college, lifelong education
lifelong.title2: Cryptocurrency is a form of digital asset that is encrypted and has a trading price. Varies according to market forces, with cryptocurrencies acting as a medium for exchanging value over the internet that is not governed by Under the control or management of any international financial authority, but will work on a system that can control Control and verify itself is called Blockchain (Blockchain).
lifelong.title3: Blockchain is a type of data storage that enables for the sharing of individual transaction data with everyone. It is similar to a chain in which blocks of data are connected to everyone and everyone knows who owns and has actual rights to that information. Once a block of data is recorded on the blockchain, it is difficult to change the data and when anyone wants to add it, everyone in the network who has a copy of the blockchain has to approve it. Can employ the algorithm To examine new transactions This new transaction will be permitted only to be recorded on the blockchain. The majority of networks only agree on the transaction's validity.
lifelong.title4: Cryptocurrencies can currently be exchanged using actual money. The trade price fluctuates due to market mechanisms. As a result, many investors want to invest in cryptocurrencies. However, due to the volatility of cryptocurrency prices, Currency is rapidly changing. In comparison to changes in stock prices, there is no market closing time. make a financial investment This form of investment is extremely risky.
lifelong.title5: A brief training course on the subject of cryptocurrency. The goal is for students to grasp the fundamentals, history, and numerous theories around blockchain and cryptocurrencies so that they may apply the technology in other disciplines, such as improving financial skills. (financial literacy), which is an important ability for kids to gain in the twenty-first century.
lifelong.title6: The curriculum is divided into three sub-units.
lifelong.title7: Unit 1: Basics of Cryptocurrencies (Cryptocurrency for New Investors)
lifelong.title8: Unit 2: Development of an automatic trading program (Trading script) for transactions with cryptocurrencies (Robot Trading)
lifelong.title9: Unit 3: Analysis and Psychology of Investing in Cryptocurrencies (Crypto Investment Tips)
lifelong.title10: Competency name: Developing an automatic trading program and analyzing investments in cryptocurrencies
lifelong.title11: Learners will receive a competency certificate when they complete all 3 modules and pass the assessment with 70%.
lifelong.title12: Study in lectures and workshops via Zoom.

nondegree.title34: Each course is taught for around six weeks and 360 hours (theory and practice combined total 90 hours).
nondegree.title36: Organize online instruction using Video on Demand so that students may independently study using videos and exercises to review the material. Each topic's video lasts around 30 minutes, with 4 subjects every week. (Learning requires about 8 hours each week)
nondegree.title38: 80 percent or more of each course's entire class time. For the purpose of revisiting the lesson, an instructional video has been made. Each week, there are also exercises to practice abilities.
nondegree.title40: Theoretical activities, practical exercises, and academic performance assessment exams must yield assessment outcomes of at least 60% for learners. will be considered as having completed the course. Students who don't achieve the required evaluation results must revisit the material and take fresh quizzes or tests. which the teacher will provide specific guidance.
nondegree.title42: A method of online Q&A is used to deliver answers. During business hours, there will be employees on hand from 9:00 AM to 4:00 PM. Basic inquiries will be addressed by the staff, while specific inquiries will be forwarded to the teacher. Students can use the Zoom system to express their desire to speak with the instructor immediately via phone or online.

about.detail0: The Department of Computer Science will be a leader in computer science. and information technology at the regional, national and international level, along with developing the quality of graduates and quality research.
about.detail1: Providing higher education By focusing on excellence academic and quality according to international standards
about.detail2: Produce research work at both basic and applied levels in the field computer science to be able to solve problems and develop the country's society.
about.detail3: Provide academic services to society to meet needs. of the community and country
about.detail4: Preserve arts, culture and good ethics
about.detail5: Guidelines for the administration of the department to achieve its vision and mission consist of 7 strategies as follows:
about.detail9: Academic service strategy to the community
about.detail10: Art preservation strategy Culture, ethics and environment
about.detail13: Computer Science Department going from nothing The Department of Mathematics houses the Computer Science program, which was established to further the subject of computer science. During the 1987 academic year, in February. gotten the go-ahead from the university affairs office to start the computer science department. The department now offers graduate-level programs at the bachelor's, master's, and doctorate levels in both regular and special semesters under both Plan A and Plan B. More than 1000 students have graduated with bachelor's degrees from it, while more than 200 have earned master's degrees. Being the company's owner benefits the company's staff members, academics, public servants, and others.
about.detail14: The academic members of the department have conducted research in a variety of areas, including theory of computation, bioinformatics, natural language processing (NLP), biomedical engineering, software engineering, networking, evolutionary algorithms, etc.
about.detail15: Academic support to promote information transfer and intellectual interchange among researchers, students, and students, the department has hosted a number of workshops, seminars, and conferences. The academic NCSEC conference and the Computer Olympiad competition were held in 2010 at the department. 6th level nationally
about.detail16: The department has a memorandum of agreement in place for collaboration with other colleges both domestically and internationally. with top universities like National Chung Cheng University (Taiwan), University of Woolongon (Australia), Armstrong Atlantic State University (America), etc.
about.detail17: Department personnel are Committed to developing the department into a first-class department Vanguard of the country to be consistent with the vision of the Department of Computer Science, which is a department that focuses on producing quality graduates with international research excellence and resources are provided for development leading to self-reliance.
about.address2: 239 stree. Huai Kaew, Suthep Subdistrict, Mueang District, Chiang Mai Province 50200
